rules.name: Initial_verification
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 10 ) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND ( 8 OR 9 )
rules.label: Initial verification

rules.name: Correspondence_Received
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 5 OR 9 ) AND 4 AND 6 AND ( 7 OR 8 )
rules.label: Correspondence Received

rules.name: Require_Driva_Action
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 6 OR 9 ) AND 4 AND 5 AND ( 7 OR 8 )
rules.label: Require Driva Action

rules.name: Initial_Assessment
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 9 ) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND ( 7 OR 8 )
rules.label: Initial Assessment

rules.name: Correspondence_Received_Assessment
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 11 ) AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND ( 9 OR 10 )
rules.label: Correspondence Received - Assessment

rules.name: Require_Driva_Action_AssessmentRequire_Driva_Action
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 9 OR 12 ) AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND ( 10 OR 11 )
rules.label: Require Driva Action - Assessment

rules.name: Lender_Lodgement
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 3 OR 6 OR 9 ) AND 2 AND 4 AND 5 AND ( 7 OR 8 )
rules.label: Lender Lodgement

rules.name: Correspondence_Received_Lodgement
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 9 ) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND ( 7 OR 8 )
rules.label: Correspondence Received - Lodgement

rules.name: Require_Driva_Action_Lodgement
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 9 ) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND ( 7 OR 8 )
rules.label: Require Driva Action - Lodgement

rules.name: Welcome_Call
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 7 ) AND 3 AND 4 AND ( 5 OR 6 )
rules.label: Welcome Call

rules.name: Correspondence_Received_Approved
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 9 ) AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6) AND ( 7 OR 8 )
rules.label: Correspondence Received - Approved

rules.name: Require_Driva_Action_Approved
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 7 ) AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6)
rules.label: Require Driva Action - Approved
